title: A Pocket Style Manual, Hacker & Sommers
description:
Publication Date: November 24, 2011 | ISBN-10: 0312542542 | ISBN-13: 978-0312542542 | Edition: Sixth Edition
Used by nearly a quarter million students each year, A Pocket Style Manual is a straightforward, inexpensive quick reference, with content flexible enough to suit the needs of writers in the humanities, social sciences, sciences, health professions, business, fine arts, education, and beyond. Its slim format, brief length, and spiral binding make it easy for students to keep A Pocket Style Manual with them for every writing assignment, in any class.
